item.title: Fidelity Fund Boosts Value of Elon Musk’s X Social Network
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- A Fidelity Investments mutual fund increased the value of its equity stake in Elon Musk’s X by more than 32% in October, its largest monthly increase since making the investment in late 2022. Fidelity’s Blue Chip Growth Fund valued its stake in X Holdings Corp., the parent of the soc...

item.title: BlackRock Is Near Deal to Buy Private Credit Manager HPS
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. is nearing a deal to buy HPS Investment Partners, a purchase that would vault the firm into the top ranks of private credit as it seeks to become a major force in alternative assets. An agreement could be announced as early as this week and value HPS at $12 billion or m...

item.title: ECB to Discuss Bigger Cut But Uncertainty High, Kazaks Says
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The European Central Bank is likely to cut interest rates again next week and while policymakers are set to debate a bigger-than-usual move, they should proceed carefully, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks. Listen to the Here’s Why podcast on Apple, Spotify or anywh...

item.title: Warum sich Encavis und andere Mittelständler von der Börse zurückziehen
item.author: Capital+
item.description: Fast 200.000 Module sollen unter dem Mecklenburger Himmel in Borrentin Sonnenlicht in grünen Strom verwandeln. item.title: Open Finance: Was die Fida-Regulierung in Aussicht stellt
item.author: dasinvestment.com
item.description: Der Traum von Open Finance bekommt durch die EU-Regulierung Fida (Financial Data Access Regulation) einen neuen Schub, der deutlich gewaltiger werden wird, als es beispielsweise durch die Payment Directive 2 (PSD2), die nur den Zugriff auf Zahlungskonten erlaubt, in den letzten Jahren zu erleben w...
